root.name: Army Men
root.description: OverviewArmy Men is an action game developed by 3DO (PC Version) and Digital Eclipse (Game Boy Color version). Army Men was published on both platforms by 3DO.PC RequirementsWindows 95/98 or ME;Pentium 90 (Min.), Pentium 133 (Rec.);2x CD-ROM drive;16MB RAM;1 MB SVGA Graphics Card (with DriectDraw min.);DirectSound compatible 8-bit sound cards;120MB of free hard drive space;Mouse Keyboard.
